mapper.select: select li.user_num, li.product_num, pi.product_num, pi.product_title, pi.idol_num, pi.category_num, pi.user_num, pi.product_contents, pi.product_price, pi.product_time, pc.category_name from like_info li inner join product_info pi on li.product_num = pi.product_num inner join product_category pc on pi.category_num = pc.category_num where li.user_num = #{user_num}
